value.name: Who is Theodore Johnson?
value.description: THEODORE Johnson is one of the UK’s most notorious serial killers. Over four decades, he murdered three women – all of whom were his former partners. Who is serial killer Theodore Johnson?

value.name: Fury as number of convicts charged with murder on licence doubles in 5 years
value.description: EXCLUSIVE: Ministry of Justice figures show that the number of early release prisoners charged with murder and sex crimes have increased in the last five years
